desc: Perform is a hair and skin care brand that offers specially formulated products. The products are made with essential oils and great for hair! Order now!

layout.text:
-Color Safe
-Paraben Free
-UV Protection Against Sun Damage
-Botanical Infusion with Aloe, Amino Acids, Keratin, and Vitam B5 Complex (Panthenol)
- Essential Oils: Peppermint, Tea Tree, Chamomille, and Lemongrass
